Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.Entities
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends Entities
    This Class represents the User, and their character. Decisions for the Player are made in the UI class, and verified by the Game Engine
